Row.Text: Hope's Peak Private Academy is an exclusive, government-sanctioned school accepting only students with exceptional abilities. its stated goal is to raise the future “hope” of the nation, and for that reason, it became known as “The Academy of Hope”. It's a source of envy for average high school students, as it's common knowledge that one can gain great success in life just by being a Hope's Peak graduate. Certainly, many Hope's Peak graduates are now employed in high positions in every field of the professional world, so that statement is not an exaggeration.
While the price of building them is steep, the Super High School Level units this building enables you to produce can be essential in helping you win via any number of different victory types.

Enables the production of Super High School Level units. These correspond to various types of Great People. Super High School Level units may use the instant actions of their corresponding Great Person at half effectiveness, but cannot produce Great Works or Improvements. Growth of the City is stopped while a Super High School Level unit is being built.

[NEWLINE]"Doesn't matter how happy something is, throw an 'FML' in there and suddenly it’s dark and depressing. Doesn't matter how negative something is, just add 'LOL' and it'll automatically become positive!"[NEWLINE] - Monokuma

May Discover Technology at half of the effectiveness of a Great Scientist.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.

May Hurry Production at half of the effectiveness of a Great Engineer.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.

May Conduct a Trade Mission at half of the effectiveness of a Great Merchant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.

May Start a Golden Age at half of the effectiveness of a Great Artist.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.

May Write a Political Treatise at half of the effectiveness of a Great Writer.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.

May Conduct a Concert Tour at half of the effectiveness of a Great Musician.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_FOOD] Growth of the City is stopped while this Unit is being built. Only one Super High School Level Unit may be owned at a time, regardless of which type it is.
